attributes.action: Keep Lee Johnson as Bristol City Manager until the end of the 2016/17 season
attributes.additional_details: Whilst Lee Johnson is in charge of the club there is a strong belief that Bristol City may be dragged well into a relegation battle. It would be a real shame for Lee Johnson to be removed from his position as the manager of Bristol City Football Club before Barnsley meet them on the 22nd of April this year and all but seal their fate of playing League 1 football next season. This would provide a real sense of justice for those faithful, loyal Barnsley supporters.
attributes.background: Lee Johnson has been one of a number to leave Barnsley FC over recent times, believing that they are bigger than the club. Whilst enjoying the success of John Stones and Alfie Mawson bettering their careers, we have also seen Brian Howard, Daniel Bogdanovic and of course Lee Johnson struggle
